name: Antventure (TheColouredMan)
description:
Anthony's home was flooded by children splashing around with water buckets.

After everyone has already moved he decides to say farewell to his old home and starts his journey through the garden, to get to his new home.  But watch out, these kids have played around with water everywhere...

Controls:
Move with WASD and Jump/Double Jump with SPACE.
